titleStmt.title: The antidote proved a counterfeit, or, Error detected and believers baptism vindicated containing an answer to a nameless author's book entituled An antidote to prevent the prevalency of anabaptism / by Hercules Collins.
titleStmt.author: Collins, Hercules, d. 1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
